Hello!

Can't defined a teiclass at tld, as define one or more variable tags.

With this implementation constrained we can't write isVaild() method to valid
attributes.
I thing it is allowed to have tld defined variable and with the TagExtraInfo 
class.

Weblogic 6.1 can handle it!

Find the bug also at RC1...

If you are using the JSP 1.2 tag library DTD, the correct element name is
<tei-class> instead of <teiclass>.  You can use <teiclass> if you reference the
JSP 1.1 tag library DTD (for backwards compatibility).
